      • connect

        boolean connect(java.lang.String host,
                int port,
                java.lang.String mac)
        Method to connect to a socket server with a port and an ip.
        Parameters:
        host - - the machine host.
        port - - the machine port.
        mac - - the machine mac.
        Returns:
        true connection OK, false connection NOK.
        See Also:
        disconnect()

        Method to disconnect a socket connection.
        Returns:
        if connection has closed or not.
        See Also:

      • sendReceive

        JCL_message_result sendReceive(JCL_message msg,
                               java.lang.Short idHost)
        Enables synchronous communication. JCL is asynchronous. It uses threads and synchronous communication to provide asynchronous communications.
        Parameters:
        msg - - the message to be sent
        idHost - - id of the destination Host.
        Returns:
        a new message or null if nothing is received in timeout millisecs.
        See Also:
        sendReceive(JCL_message_control msg, Short idHost)
